translations: v.有助于，提高，改进（印象，声誉）；产生反作用，报应；增添，累积，上升

sentences.sentence: His actions redound on his parents.
sentences.translation: 他的行动回报了他的父母。

sentences.sentence: This work will redound to his credit.
sentences.translation: 这项工作将有助于提高他的声望。

sentences.sentence: My skill in such matters might redound to my advantage.
sentences.translation: 我在这种事情上的技能可能会对我有所帮助。
